# Palette Recognition - ASP.NET Core Razor Pages Project

## Project Overview
This is an ASP.NET Core Razor Pages web application for palette recognition using C#, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Technology Stack
- **Backend**: C# with ASP.NET Core
- **Frontend**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **Framework**: Razor Pages
- **Build System**: .NET CLI

## Workspace Setup Notes
- Use `dotnet build` to compile the project
- Use `dotnet run` to start the development server
- Access the application at `https://localhost:5001`
- All server-side code is in C#
- All client-side assets are in the `wwwroot` folder

## Development Guidelines
- Follow ASP.NET Core conventions for folder structure
- Razor Pages are located in the `Pages` folder
- Static files (CSS, JS, images) go in `wwwroot`
- Models and services go in appropriate folders
- Use C# for all backend logic
